titleInfo.title: Old Crow Medicine Show at the Ryman Auditorium (2012)

mods.abstract: Two color window card (white and brown on light brown) announcing Old Crow Medicine Show at the Ryman Auditorium on December 31. Poster features a woodcut a a man holding a gun next to a car.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
